Name: [Revelation/Execution] Sneaky Sniping
Desc:
[Revelation/Execution SKill]
Shoots at enemies with arrows condensed with evil energy. Hold down the key and continue aiming at enemies to increase attack range. Release the key to deal a fatal blow to the enemies by penetrating them with a giant arrows. [Execution] Sneaky Sniping resets Shadow Step's cooldown when defeating an enemy.

H.Old:
Consumes 350 MP during key-down for 1.6 sec to generate 5 impacts. Attacks up to 12 enemies at 287% Damage 12 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec
H.New:
MP Cost: 350. Key down for up to 1.6 sec. Generates impact 5 times that attacks up to 12 enemies at 287% Damage 12 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
